pkmkdoc.description:
Library for calculation of steam and water properties using the IAPWS IF97 correlations.
See http://freesteam.sourceforge.net/ for more details.

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf540 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 \ Use 'freesteam-config' from a terminal to see compiler parameters required when building/linking against freesteam.\ \ Use 'python' then 'from freesteam import *' from a terminal to access freesteam via its Python language bindings.\ \ Example code for freesteam has been installed. See /usr/local/share/freesteam/examples.\ \ Please use the 'freesteam-users' mailing list (see http://freesteam.sourceforge.net/) if you have any questions.\ \ Note that the Python language bindings link against Apple Python 2.5. If you don't have this version of Python on your machine (perhaps on newer or older versions of OS X), these language bindings will not work and you will have to build freesteam from source.\ }

requirement.message: You must first install GSL-1.13 on your system. This can be downloaded from http://ascendwiki.cheme.cmu.edu/Binary_installer_for_GSL-1.13_on_Mac_OS_X
